original_text: And you shall speak my words to them, whether they hear or refuse to hear, for they are a rebellious house.
korean_text: 그들은 심히 패역한 자라 그들이 듣든지 아니 듣든지 너는 내 말로 고할지어다

sentences.original_text: And you shall speak my words to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그들에게 내 말을 전하라

sentences.original_text: whether they hear or refuse to hear
for they are a rebellious house
